definition: awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

sentences.english: And salt and Glauber's salt mainly constitute of dissolving salts.
sentences.chinese: 其中易溶鹽的主要成分是石鹽和芒硝。

sentences.english: Mirabilite reacted with ammonium bicarbonate under the proper conditions to obtain sodium bicarbonate and mother liquor.
sentences.chinese: 芒硝和碳酸氫銨在適宜的條件下反應得重鹼和母液。

sentences.english: Highly mineralized groundwater can be explored from strongly salinized land thus producing mirabilite and table salt.
sentences.chinese: 重度鹽鹼地可開採高礦化地下水，生產芒硝和食鹽。

sentences.english: Kinetics of the reduction of sodium sulfate to sodium sulfide by hydrogen is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用氫氣還原芒硝製備硫化鈉的反應動力學。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the production and market status quo of Glauber ′s salt industry in China on a comprehensive basis.
sentences.chinese: 本文較全面的分析了我國芒硝工業的生產與市場現狀。

sentences.english: Practical application of oil pad process and its effect in Glauber Salt Mine of Li County is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了油墊法在澧縣芒硝礦的實際應用情況以及效果。

sentences.english: There is abundant high-grade glauber salt deposit in Hongze County.
sentences.chinese: 洪澤縣境內蘊藏着豐富的高品位芒硝礦。

definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
